intro: Hieracium sjodalense, commonly known as the Sjödal's hawkweed, is a flowering plant in the family Asteraceae. It is characterized by its bright yellow composite flowers and is native to parts of Europe. The plant typically grows in meadows and grasslands, preferring well-drained soils. It has hairy stems and leaves that are often lobed or serrated. Hieracium sjodalense is known for its ability to thrive in a variety of environmental conditions.
